description:
Learn how to work with multi-tracks and essential techniques for getting the most out of your audio products.

This course is for those looking to build on their basic knowledge of Adobe Audition CC and is a great follow-up to our first course, Audition CC Fundamentals. Learn how to work with multi-tracks and essential techniques for getting the most out of your audio products. Towards the end of this course we discuss how to export and share your work created in Audition

By taking this course, youâ€™ll be able to export projects, import a project from Adobe Premiere, work with Tracks, and Multitrack Tools
title: Audition CC Building on the Fundamentals
